mapper.update: update l_province set provinceid=provinceid ,provincecode=#{provincecode} ,provincename=#{provincename} ,orderno=#{orderno} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} where provinceid=#{provinceid}

update l_province set provinceid=provinceid ,provincecode=#{provincecode} ,provincename=#{provincename} ,orderno=#{orderno} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} where 1=1 and provinceid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and provinceid =#{Where_Id} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and provincecode=#{Where_provincecode} and provincename=#{Where_provincename} and orderno=#{Where_orderno} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude}
mapper.select: select t.provinceid "provinceid", t.provincecode "provincecode", t.provincename "provincename", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_province t where provinceid=#{provinceid}

select t.provinceid "provinceid", t.provincecode "provincecode", t.provincename "provincename", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_province t where 1=1 and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.provincecode=#{provincecode} and t.provincename=#{provincename} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}

select t.provinceid "provinceid", t.provincecode "provincecode", t.provincename "provincename", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_province t where 1=1 and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.provincecode=#{provincecode} and t.provincename=#{provincename} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}
mapper.delete: delete from l_province where 1=1 and provinceid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and provinceid =#{Where_Id} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and provincecode=#{Where_provincecode} and provincename=#{Where_provincename} and orderno=#{Where_orderno} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude}
mapper.select: select t.provinceid "provinceid", t.provincecode "provincecode", t.provincename "provincename", t.orderno "orderno", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude" from l_province t where 1=1 and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.provincecode=#{provincecode} and t.provincename=#{provincename} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}

select count(*) from l_province t where 1=1 and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.provinceid!=#{NoId} and t.provincecode=#{provincecode} and t.provincename=#{provincename} and t.orderno=#{orderno} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude}
